Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Model
    The model represents all the actual content and functionality of the app For Breakout, it manages all the game objects that the View needs (the bat, ball, bricks, and the score), provides methods to allow the Controller to move the bat (and a couple of other fucntions - change the speed or stop the game), and runs a background process (a 'thread') that moves the ball every 20 milliseconds and checks for collisions
